thread.section_title: Travel from Israel, Ynetnews - A Trip to the Past
thread.title: Israel's beauty captured from above
thread.title_full: Israel's beauty captured from above - Israel Travel, Ynetnews

author: ynetnews
title: Israel's beauty captured from above
text:
Tweet
Paragliders haven't earned a very good name for themselves in Israel and around the world recently, due in part to near collisions and disruptions to various flying contraptions considered to be slightly more main stream.
 But paragliders make up for their downsides with an unparalleled potential to capture aerial visuals, and no one is more familiar with these abilities than Israeli Nir Hoffman (45) who took to the air recently, capturing Israel's beaches and hottest tourist destinations of 2015 in stunning quality.
 צילום: ניר הופמן
סגור שליחה לחבר כתובת דוא''ל של החבר שמך כתובת הדוא''ל שלך נושא הקלידו את הקוד המוצג תמונה חדשה
